snippet: A new 10-year partnership ended a previous alliance between the Australian carrier and British Airways, and aimed to reverse losses on Qantas’s international business.
abstract: Qantas Airways of Australia ends a long-running partnership with British Airways and announces it will instead form a new 10-year one with Emirates of Dubai on European routes in an effort to help turn around its beleaguered international operations.
lead_paragraph: A new 10-year partnership ended a previous alliance between the Australian carrier and British Airways, and aimed to reverse losses on Qantas’s international business.

headline.main: Qantas in a Venture to Improve International Reach
headline.print_headline: Qantas in a Venture to Improve International Reach
